item.title: Research
item.description: Table of Contents Data Mining for Digital Humanities Digital History Ethical, Social, and Political Implications of Digital Technoscience The Economy of Affectionate Exchanges: Market, Socialities, and Digital Media Data Mining for Digital Humanities The acquisition of computational skills in research practice across various fields of the humanities is one of the pillars of what is being called Digital Humanities.
